title: Trump Administration Immigration Policy Priorities – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
October 8, 2017
Executive SummaryThe Trump Administration is ready to work with Congress to achieve three immigration policy objectives to ensure safe and lawful admissions; defend the safety and security of our country; and protect American workers and taxpayers.BORDER SECURITY:  Build a southern border wall and close legal loopholes that enable illegal immigration and swell the court backlog.  INTERIOR ENFORCEMENT:  Enforce our immigration laws and return visa overstays.MERIT-BASED IMMIGRATION SYSTEM:  Establish reforms that protect American workers and promote financial success.
